meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7151.

td.p: Dean Meyer, a scientific editor from Winder, Georgia
Martin Schmidt, a consultant from Media, Pennsylvania
Josh Silverman, a graduate student from Miami, Florida (whose 2-day cash winnings total $34,800)

tr.td: CELEBRITY COOKBOOKS
MARK YOUR CALENDARS
CONTEMPORARIES
THAT'S SHOE BIZ!
"ETTE" TOO
BRUTE, EH?
